title: Axiom Space refines training for next private astronaut mission
summary: As Axiom Space gears up for its third private astronaut mission to the International Space Station, the company says it has refined the training needed to effectively carry out those missions.

title: India sets sights on a Moon landing in 2040, but is it realistic?
summary: Also on tap for India: A space station and a Venus orbiter.

title: Danti gets U.S. Space Force contract for data search engine
summary: Danti, a startup that developed a geospatial data search engine, was awarded a $1.2 million contract by the U.S. Space Force to further develop its AI-enabled technology.

title: HawkEye 360 raises $10 million in funding round extension
summary: HawkEye 360, a commercial operator of remote-sensing satellites, has secured an additional $10 million in an extension of its Series D-1 investment round.

title: Small launch companies struggle to complete with SpaceX rideshare missions
summary: Industry executives argue that SpaceX’s dominant position in the launch market is making it difficult for small launch vehicles to compete, as a prominent investor warns of a wave of bankruptcies among launch companies.

title: Atomos wins $1.6 million AFWERX contract to test multi-party rendezvous
summary: Atomos Space won a $1.6 million AFWERX contract to establish a ground-based testing facility for multi-party rendezvous and proximity operations.

title: CesiumAstro wins NASA award to study wideband communications
summary: CesiumAstro won a NASA contract to design a space-qualified wideband active phased array terminal to communicate with commercial and government networks.

title: Government funding blunts impact of private investment decline
summary: Private investment in space companies has declined, while U.S. government funding for space programs is climbing.

title: Space radio developer AnySignal emerges from stealth
summary: One-year-old Californian startup AnySignal emerged from stealth mode Oct. 16 with $5 million in funding behind a multi-purpose space radio platform.

title: Test Flight to Kick Off India’s Human Exploration Plans, Including a Man on the Moon by 2040
summary: As India readies for a test flight of the crew escape system for a new human-rated launch vehicle this weekend, Prime Minister Narendra Modi laid out exploration goals including an […]
